title: Counter-signs?
selftext:
I've seen a lot of big Trump/Pence signs on street corners in my area.

I'd like to print out signs that quote some of the nastier things Trump has said. I really think that if more moderate conservatives just *heard* the things he believes, they probably wouldn't be so into him. I'm thinking I'd put these "counter-signs" beside the Trump/Pence ones.

Does anyone have experience with printing out political signs and erecting them on street corners? Have you seen anything similar to this? I have no experience but I'm willing to burn some money on it.

I've looked at a few websites and they quote 2' x 3' signs at $20-30 each.
